methodOfCooking: Boil noodles separately. Cook vegetables and meat with spices, garlic, and ginger. Add broth, and then the noodles. Let it simmer before serving.
Make dough from rice flour and water. Shape it into cones and fill with a mixture of chaku, sesame seeds, and coconut. Steam for about 10 minutes.
Fry garlic, ginger, and onion in mustard oil. Add dried meat and cook until tender. Add tomatoes and chili, simmer for a few minutes, and serve hot.
